edge: Initially, June and Cristabel are both considered potential love interests for Nate. However, as the story progresses, Cristabel begins dating Nate, while June starts dating Johann. This leads to a shift in their relationships with each other.
He seems to want to do a makeover on June when he apparently sees her inner beauty.
June begins dating Johann, but eventually rejects him and realizes she has feelings for Nate.
Johann sees Cristabel as a potential love interest before realizing that June is the girl of his dreams.
As Nate gets to know June, he begins to appreciate her inner beauty and starts to develop feelings for her.
